text: Bazlur Rahman Badal (1921/1922 â€“ 19 August 2018) was a Bangladeshi dancer. He was awarded Shilpakala Padak in 2014 and Independence Day Award in 2017. He was known for his dances inspired from the poem Bidrohi of Kazi Nazrul Islam. Badal died on 19 August 2018 in Rajshahi, Bangladesh of pneumonia complicated from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1920s births Category:2018 deaths Category:Bangladeshi entertainers Category:Dancers Category:People from Rajshahi Division
